ModMetaData.name: Days Matter
ModMetaData.author: WiseClock
ModMetaData.description:
Required Mod: HugsLib
<size=24>What does this mod do?</size> Days Matter allows you to add and remove memorial days. The colonist will start party accordingly.
<size=24>Installataion</size> You can install and enable this mod at any time.
<size=24>Uninstallation</size> You can disable and uninstall this mod at any time. However, after you disabled the mod, you'll see some error popping up the first time you load a save with this mod. It is safe to just override the save file, and you will not see the error message any more.
<size=24>Extra</size> In vanilla version, birthdays of colonists born before the start of the game were calculated wrong, this mod fixes it.
